name: Boyarsky's Chip
flavorText: This fragment of a gem, called  a chip, was discovered in an underground vault by old man Boyarsky, who fashioned it into the beautiful gem it is today. It damages those who would damage its owner, and once inserted into a socket, it will never fall out.
flavorTextHtml: This fragment of a gem, called a chip, was discovered in an underground vault by old man Boyarsky, who fashioned it into the beautiful gem it is today. It damages those who would damage its owner, and once inserted into a socket, it will never fall out.

secondary.textHtml: Adds 16,000 Thorns. 16,000
